text: was a Japanese samurai. He was a general in the forces of Oda Nobunaga.Nussbaum, Louis-Frédéric. (2005). "Akechi Mitsuhide" in Japan Encyclopedia, p. 18. He was from Mino Province. ==Timeline== * 1580 (Tenshō 8): Akechi was put in charge of establishing a survey of Yamato Province in the area of modern Nara Prefecture * 1581 (Tenshō 9): Akechi was charged with making a survey of Tango Province north of Kyoto * 1582 (Tenshō 10): Nobunaga was assassinated by Akechi Mitsuhide.Nussbaum, "Honnō-ji" at p. 350. Akechi defeated by Hashiba Hideyoshi soon later, hurted by civilian and made a seppuku. ==Related pages== * Azuchi-Momoyama period ==References== ==Other websites == Category:1528 births Category:1582 deaths Category:Samurai Category:People from Gifu Prefecture
